product_name: Benefit CosmeticsBADgal BANG! Volumizing Mascara Mini
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingShop Benefit's BADgal BANG! Volumizing Mascara Mini at Ulta. Try out this "Bigger, Badder Volumizing Mascara" in a mini to get MASSIVE volume without weighing down lashes!
details: DetailsBenefitsSmudge-proofWater-resistantVolumizing mascaraFeatures90% saw dramatic volume**94% said it instantly lifted lashes**92% said it lengthened lashes****Self-evaluation by 102 women after 1 weekKey IngredientsProVitamin B5 known to fuel thickness & strengthItem 2522238How To UseUsing quick & gentle strokes, wiggle the big slimpact! brush from the base to tips of lashes. Layer as desired to build BIG volume. To get the biggest BANG, apply to upper AND lower lashes.BEAUTY TIP: BADgals go BIG! Pair BADgal BANG! Volumizing Mascara with Benefit's Roller Liner Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner (sold separately) to complete your wide-awake, flirty eye look!IngredientsAqua (Water), Paraffin, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Acrylates Copolymer, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Polybutene, Steareth-21, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Steareth-2, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Panthenol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Silica Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Nylon-12, BHT. May Contain: CI 19140 (Yellow 5, Yellow 5 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines), CI 77163 (Bismuth Oxychloride), CI 77288 (Chromium Oxide Greens), CI 77289 (Chromium Hydroxide Green), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77510 (Ferric Ferrocyanide, Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide), CI 77742 (Manganese Violet), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide). N¬∞ 11535/A.Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Using quick & gentle strokes, wiggle the big slimpact! brush from the base to tips of lashes. Layer as desired to build BIG volume. To get the biggest BANG, apply to upper AND lower lashes.BEAUTY TIP: BADgals go BIG! Pair BADgal BANG! Volumizing Mascara with Benefit's Roller Liner Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner (sold separately) to complete your wide-awake, flirty eye look!
ingredients: please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use

reviews.headline: No longer like
reviews.comments: Must have changed it's ingredients because it leaves lashes clunky.

reviews.headline: This is my favorite mascara but..
reviews.comments: I have bought this mascara religiously for years, it's my favorite. But I think the formula may have changed or I got a bad tube. I feel like it's going on a lot thicker and clumpier than I remember in past experiences.

reviews.headline: I would buy again and again
reviews.comments: Love love love it

reviews.headline: I have and will continue to purchase this item.
reviews.comments: I love the way it goes on my lashes.  It also makes them longer and feathered.  I have used this product previously and will continue to do so because of its ease to put on and take off.  I like the smaller containers.

reviews.headline: Perfect for my straight lashes!
reviews.comments: Love the separation and length this mascara gives! This one keeps my curl as well for my bone-straight lashes. Will buy again.

reviews.headline: Best mascara ever
reviews.comments: I love this masscara i have benn using it since it came out love love love it

reviews.headline: Volume Galore
reviews.comments: Highly recommend

reviews.headline: Totally buying again
reviews.comments: Bought this to try, my daughter told me to try but never answered my text to verify if it was one she had bought. It was and I love it will definitely be buying it again.

reviews.headline: Love this mascara!! Beautiful!!
reviews.comments: Makes my eyelashes look long and full! Love the way it looks!

reviews.headline: Itch, eyes swell
reviews.comments: I put it on my lashes and it looked great..within a short time my eyes started to itch, and then it was all a horrible messü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.headline: I Love this product. It works wonders on my lashes
reviews.comments: Great purchase. Would recommend to a friend.

reviews.headline: I would not buy it again
reviews.comments: Irritates my eyes and can't keep it on me all day

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: The best

reviews.headline: Runs
reviews.comments: In a few hours, it was all under my eyes and I only put it on my top lashes.

reviews.headline: Amazing, I would get it again
reviews.comments: 100%recommend

reviews.headline: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE
reviews.comments: When I first used this mascara I was amazed, it was gorgeous and lenthgthened my lashes beautifully! Although after around 1 min they had COMPLETELY fallen down and I tried to curl them again and nothing happened. I do not recommend this at all it is terrible.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I'm a loyal fan of Benefits Roller Lash mascara, on a whim I bought a mini trio and I am obsessed with BADgirl, 12 hours later my mascara still looks amazing and my lashes are still curled.

reviews.headline: Definitely buying it again
reviews.comments: Loved how it makes my lashes look and feel, not at all heavy or weighed down

reviews.headline: Average at best
reviews.comments:
Not the best Benefit mascara. Not one for multiple coats, and it clumps easily. No amazing length or volume added. My eyes actually feel a bit irritated when wearing it.
Only good thing is that I bought the mini, so if I toss it, at least it wasn't full-sized and more money wasted ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: Very lightweight,  actually gives me lashes ( have very little of my own) can go from a little to a lot with just a few sweeps .

faceoff_positive.comments: I am Miss Finicky Extraordinaire when it comes to mascara.  Sometimesan inexpensive mascara will do the trick; sometimes it doesn't.  I've tried $40 mascaras that are positively horrendous, and $10 mascaras that are completely amazing!  The first time I tried BeneFit's BadGal Bang! I got it as a sample in my BirchBox.  It sounded like so much fun I just had to try it.  I am in my early 50's now, but I actually look 29.  I'm genetically blessed.  I still have a full set of lashes on each eye, and they are naturally long and curly, so eyelash curlers are foreign to me.  The only drawback?  My eyelashes are blonde tipped, so they look shorter than they really are.  BadGal Bang! not only makes my lashes look their natural long length, they make me look like I'm wearing falsies, hee hee!  I've actually had a number of Ulta assistants come up to me while I've been browsing and ask me which brand of falsies I was using.  Imagine their astonishment when I informed them they were my natural lashes!  Ooo, were there some green eyed monsters!  BadGalBang is evrything as advertised, and then some!  Must have more!
faceoff_positive.headline: BadGal Bang! makes me look like a bad girl!

faceoff_negative.comments: I frequently try new mascaras as I can never seem to find my holy Grail. I will use a mascara for a little bit but always will want to try something when it comes out and it's new. I bought the small mini size of this because the store raved about it as well as some reviews I read online the brush looked like it would be something I liked. Mind you I have very long eyelashes however I need them to separate most importantly. My lashes never seem to say curled and less I use a curler which is fine. This mascara not only did not separate but was so clumpy it literally gave me three lashes. I tried brushing it out with a separate comb and that did not help.  I had to actually wipe this mascara off and ruin my eye make up because I could not go out and look that way. Although weekend I decided to try it again and a ply it with a different technique and I had the same outcome. This is the worst mascara I have used in sometime and usually with a comb I can make stuff work but this I could not. I'm not sure if it's the formula or the brush or both but you are much better spending money on even a drugstore products before buying this .
faceoff_negative.headline: Worst Mascara in Long time
